text: @Yamiche @wildwestleft @IlhanMN Her father, who brought her here for opportunities in the U.S., which the family clearly has made a success of, has DIED of Coronavirus and the effing PRESIDENT OF THE UNITED STATES is giving her grief? Making racist comments??
